title: Cinderella Is Dead - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Mystery   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Character Growth   Complex Family Relationships   Dead Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Loneliness   Lovers Reunited   Nobles   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnation   Royalty   Second Chance   Suicides   Weak to Strong
author: 렘티
description:
My lover was found dead on the wedding day. With another girl.

Riddell dies one month after the death of her fiance, the Prince. Riddell, who died at the age of twenty-two, returns to the past six years ago.

In front of Riddell, who decides not to repeat the same tragedy, the secret of her dead lover and the secret surrounding his death are revealed one by one…>
